About me

  • Product Design
  • UX Design
  • Prototyping

I'm a freelance creative front‑end developer with 8+ years of professional experience, based in Leskovac, Serbia.

I love working with agencies and brands to help them realise their goal of creating truly outstanding digital experiences.
